about_the_game:
Experience a dazzling running action-adventure game with easy controls!Run, dash, overcome obstacles, and collect super coins to set new records!
Create your own maps, share them, and challenge other players to push their limits.

Enjoy Various Game Modes!

■ Daily Contest
Take on the ever-changing Daily Contest map to receive amazing rewards.
The greater your skills, the better the rewards that await you!

■ Stage Mode
Clear 100 unique stages and test your racing skills.
Collect super coins to level up and grow your character!

■ Infinite Mode
Keep the challenges going in Infinite Mode.
Show off your skills without any limits and dominate the leaderboard!

Build and Share Your Own Levels!

■ Create your own levels with a simple and intuitive level editor.
Design race tracks that are nearly impossible to conquer or create the fastest route imaginable.
You can even craft challenging puzzles that will push your friends to their limits!

■ Create with the community!
Share your custom courses with the community and showcase your creativity.
Build your own racing kingdom and become the star of your maps!

Choose Your Own Gameplay Style

■ Win in your unique style.
Discover your favorite among a cast of vibrant and distinctive characters that can change the game.
Experiment with different characters or master a single one to showcase your true skill.
Receive rewards based on your mastery level and unlock exclusive character skins for each one.

■ Build your own power-up deck.
Create your perfect deck from a variety of unlockable power-ups.
Pick power-ups that match your favorite runner or playstyle.
Will you choose offensive power-ups to crush your rivals?
Or focus on speed to prove you’re the fastest of them all?

Neon Runners: Craft and Dash

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: N/A
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: N/A

name: Neon Runners: Craft & Dash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10, 11 (64Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB or AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10, 11 (64Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB or AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: NEON RUNNERS blends running action with puzzle platforming, creating an exciting new genre. Join daily race contests and receive amazing rewards based on your skills! Choose and upgrade your runner to fit your style and explore various game modes. Available on Steam and mobile platforms.
supported_languages:
English*, Indonesian, Portuguese - Brazil, Filipino, French, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Italian
*languages with full audio support
